explanation: [0-0] A young man sits in a colorful children's amusement boat, his hands on the steering wheel. The boat is painted with bright patterns and anchor decorations. He is wearing a blue shirt and black pants, and the background is a grassy field.

[0-6] The man shakes the lever on the steering wheel, swaying his body from side to side. The camera then zooms in on the man holding a pink lever, and another amusement boat can be seen in front of him. The scene then cuts to a middle-aged woman in black clothes. Trees and grass can be seen in the distance behind her, and a row of amusement facilities are arranged on the grass. The woman then shakes her right hand angrily. The scene switches back to the young man in the boat. He reaches out and holds his head in horror, then looks forward with a pained expression. The scene cuts back to the woman in black, who is talking and gesturing with her right hand, then points with her right index finger.
